author: itv.com
title: Most wanted in Tyneside and Northumberland |
text:
Northumbria police are releasing the details of nine people in an effort to find and arrest them.
Those identified on this list are all being sought by officers and are wanted in connection with serious offences including theft, burglary and violence.
Their details are being released as part of continued efforts to trace them and get them arrested.
Danny Hickson, 32, from Blyth in Northumberland Donna Teague, 34, from Forest Hall in North Tyneside Warren Bailey, 24 Stephen Mordue, 23 Sean White, 34, from Wallsend Gary Spencer, 23, from East Howdon, North Tyneside Michael Cottis, 24, from Wallsend Jordan Hammond, 23, from Wallsend Peter Dodds, 31, from Blyth. Last updated Mon 6 Feb 2017 Sunderland York
